title: ip problem

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: i didn't receive and ip for the last 2 games i have played .  i don't know why not .

replies.body: It sounds strange that you didn't receive ip for a completed game, and we'd like to look into this for you.  It looks like you have already submitted a ticket which is great!  A specialist will reach out to you asap and look into your specific issue individually.  Thanks for your patience!
